collection.title: Food Storage Containers
collection.body_html: Keep your homemade baby food fresh, organised, and ready for mealtime. Our collection of food storage containers are made from safe, non-toxic materials like glass and silicone, with airtight and leak-proof lids to preserve nutrients and flavour. Perfect for storing portions in the fridge or packing in a diaper bag for days out.

products.title: B.Duck Multifunctional Baby Bag & Portable Child Dining Chair – Diaper Bag Backpack, Travel-Friendly Storage & Baby Essentials | Essential Feeding & Care Solution for Parents
products.body_html:
B.Duck Multifunctional Baby Bag & Portable Child Dining Chair combines practical storage with a smart convertible design to deliver the ultimate travel-friendly solution for modern parents. This thoughtfully engineered bag doubles as a portable child dining chair, ensuring you’re always prepared for feeding and care—whether at home, on the go, or outdoors.

Smart Design Features

  • 2-in-1 Functionality – Serves as both a spacious diaper bag and a safe portable dining chair for your little one.
  • Ample Storage Capacity – Multiple compartments keep bottles, diapers, wipes, toys, and baby essentials neatly organized.
  • Durable & Travel-Friendly Build – Designed with high-quality, wear-resistant materials for long-lasting use.
  • Comfortable Dining Setup – Integrated child seat provides a stable and secure feeding environment anywhere.
  • Portable & Lightweight – Easy-to-carry backpack style makes it convenient for outings, trips, and daily use.
  • Stylish B.Duck Design – Fun, modern look that parents love and kids enjoy.

Setup and Usage

  1. Open bag and unfold the built-in dining chair feature.
  2. Secure the straps firmly to a standard chair for stability.
  3. Place your child in the seat, fastening all safety belts.
  4. Use storage compartments to access feeding supplies easily.
  5. After use, fold the chair back into backpack form for effortless carrying.

Product Specifications

  • Material: Premium Oxford fabric with reinforced stitching
  • Style: Multifunctional diaper bag backpack with foldable dining chair
  • Dimensions: Spacious storage capacity with compact foldable design
  • Colors: Classic B.Duck editions with stylish patterns
  • Suitable for: Infants and toddlers during feeding, travel, or outdoor activities
  • Package Includes: 1 multifunctional baby bag with built-in portable dining chair

Why Choose This Bag & Chair

 

  •  Saves Space & Time – Combines two essential baby products in one smart design.
  • Parent-Friendly – Keeps everything organized while ensuring your child always has a safe feeding seat.
  • Durable & Practical – Built to handle daily use and travel without compromising comfort.
  • Stylish & Fun – Adds a playful B.Duck charm while meeting everyday parenting needs.


A Nestacular Promise

products.title: Glessia Silicone Tableware for Babies – Baby Silicone Grid Plate & Assorted Silicone Ice Trays, Safe & Durable Design | Essential Feeding and Storage Set for Infants & Toddlers
products.body_html:
Glessia Silicone Tableware for Babies combines safe, durable design with practical versatility to create the ultimate feeding and storage set for modern families. This thoughtfully crafted set includes a baby silicone grid plate and assorted silicone ice trays, making mealtime and food prep easier, safer, and more enjoyable. Designed to support infants and toddlers as they transition to solid foods, this set ensures both convenience and peace of mind for parents.

Smart Design Features

  • Baby Silicone Grid Plate with divided sections helps portion meals and encourages self-feeding
  • Assorted Silicone Ice Trays ideal for preparing, freezing, and storing baby-friendly purees, fruits, and snacks
  • Durable food-grade silicone construction ensures long-lasting, safe daily use
  • Non-slip base keeps the grid plate steady on tables and highchair trays
  • Easy-to-clean surface resists stains and odors for hassle-free maintenance
  • Lightweight and portable design perfect for at-home use or outings

Setup and Usage

  • Place the silicone grid plate on any flat surface for stable feeding
  • Use ice trays to portion and freeze baby food, breast milk, or healthy snacks
  • Wash all pieces with warm soapy water or place in the dishwasher for effortless cleaning
  • Store trays in the freezer and remove portions as needed for quick meal prep

Product Specifications

  • Material: 100% food-grade, BPA-free silicone
  • Components: 1 silicone grid plate + assorted silicone ice trays
  • Style: Non-slip, durable, and easy-to-clean design
  • Colors: Available in soft pastel shades to suit any nursery or kitchen style
  • Suitable for: Infants and toddlers transitioning to solid foods
  • Package: Complete feeding and storage set

Why Choose This Set

 

  •  All-in-one solution for feeding and food prep
  • Promotes healthy eating habits with portion-friendly design
  • Safe, eco-friendly materials that protect your child’s health
  • Durable enough for daily use yet gentle for babies
  • Makes mealtime more organized, fun, and stress-free

products.title: Marvrik Foldable Storage Baby Soothing Bed Rocking Chair – Multi-Purpose Design with Toys | Essential Relaxation & Comfort Solution for Infants & Toddlers
products.body_html:
Marvrik Foldable Storage Baby Soothing Bed Rocking Chair blends comfort, functionality, and smart design to create the ultimate relaxation and play solution for infants and toddlers. This thoughtfully engineered chair doubles as a soothing bed, rocking chair, and play station with toys—offering parents a versatile all-in-one essential for daily care.

Smart Design Features

  • Multi-purpose design works as a soothing bed, rocking chair, and play seat with engaging toys
  • Foldable structure allows quick setup and compact storage when not in use
  • Integrated toy attachments keep your baby entertained while encouraging early learning
  • Gentle rocking motion provides calming comfort to help babies rest and relax
  • Durable build quality ensures safe and long-lasting use
  • Generous dimensions provide a comfortable and secure seating/lying area
  • Neutral and stylish design blends seamlessly with home interiors

Setup and Usage

  1. Unfold chair and lock securely into position
  2. Place baby comfortably in the cushioned seating/lying area
  3. Engage rocking function or keep stationary based on your baby’s needs
  4. Attach/remove toy bar as desired for feeding, playing, or resting
  5. Fold flat after use for convenient storage or travel

Product Specifications

  • Material: Premium durable frame with soft cushioned seating
  • Dimensions: Expands to full baby bed/rocking chair size
  • Style: Foldable soothing bed and rocking chair with toys
  • Colors: Available in calming modern tones
  • Suitable for: Infants and toddlers (resting, soothing, and playtime)
  • Package Includes: 1 foldable baby soothing bed rocking chair with toys

Why Choose This Chair

 

  •  Space-saving foldable design ideal for modern homes
  • Multi-functional—combines sleeping, soothing, and play in one product
  • Gentle rocking promotes relaxation and better rest for infants
  • Toy attachments foster sensory development and entertainment
  • Durable construction ensures lasting use throughout early childhood
  • Portable design makes it perfect for both home and travel use

products.title: Nibby Portable Glass Baby Bottle – Thermostatic Milk Storage & Feeding Bottle
products.body_html:
The Nibby Portable Glass Baby Bottle is the perfect blend of safety, durability, and smart feeding design. Made from high-quality borosilicate glass, this bottle ensures safe milk storage and long-lasting use, even under high temperatures.

With its thermostatic function, the Nibby bottle helps maintain the right milk temperature, making feeding time more convenient for parents and comfortable for babies. Its anti-colic nipple mimics natural breastfeeding to reduce gas, spit-up, and fussiness.

Lightweight, portable, and easy to clean, this glass baby bottle is ideal for home use or travel, giving parents peace of mind and infants a safe, natural feeding experience.

Key Features:

  • Premium Glass Material: Durable, heat-resistant borosilicate glass.

  • Thermostatic Storage: Maintains milk at a safe, warm temperature.

  • Anti-Colic Nipple: Natural breastfeeding feel to reduce discomfort.

  • Portable Design: Easy to carry for travel and on-the-go feeding.

  • Safe & Hygienic: BPA-free and easy to sterilize.

Choose the Nibby Portable Glass Baby Bottle for safe, stress-free, and natural feeding every day.

products.title: Pupety Baby Disposable Meal Bag | Portable Food Storage for Travel & Outings
products.body_html:
Make feeding time easier with this Baby Disposable Meal Bag, designed for parents who need a safe, clean, and convenient way to store meals on the go. Perfect for travel, daycare, picnics, or outings, these bags are lightweight, hygienic, and easy to carry.

Crafted from food-grade, BPA-free material, the disposable meal bags keep your baby’s food fresh and safe. They are ideal for packing snacks, fruits, baby food, or formula powder, giving parents peace of mind when outside the home.

Once used, simply dispose of the bag — no need for washing or carrying messy containers. A must-have for busy parents who value both convenience and hygiene.

Key Features:

  • Safe BPA-free, food-grade material

  • Disposable design for hygienic feeding

  • Lightweight and portable for travel or daycare

  • Ideal for storing baby snacks, fruits, or formula

  • Time-saving alternative to reusable containers

Ensure your baby always has fresh and safe food ready, wherever you go!

products.title: Silicone Baby Bottle Brush Set with Storage Box - Food Grade Cleaning Kit
products.body_html:
Bottol Silicone Baby Bottle Brush Set combines hygienic, durable design with a convenient storage box to create the perfect cleaning solution for modern families. This thoughtfully designed set ensures every bottle, nipple, and straw is thoroughly cleaned, keeping your baby's feeding essentials safe and ready for daily use.

Complete Baby Bottle Cleaning Solution

This premium food-grade silicone brush set provides thorough cleaning for all baby feeding accessories. The soft silicone bristles effectively clean without scratching delicate bottle surfaces, while the ventilated storage box maintains hygiene between uses.

Smart Design Features

  • Soft silicone bristles provide thorough cleaning without scratching bottles
  • Durable construction ensures long-lasting use compared to traditional brushes
  • Ergonomic handle offers a secure, comfortable grip during washing
  • Multi-functional brush heads designed for bottles, nipples, and straws
  • Ventilated storage box keeps brushes organized and hygienic between uses
  • Quick-dry design prevents odor and bacteria build-up

Setup and Usage

  • Rinse brushes with warm water before first use
  • Use bottle brush for standard and wide-neck bottles
  • Switch to nipple or straw brush for smaller feeding accessories
  • After washing, rinse brushes and place back into the storage box
  • Clean brushes regularly to maintain hygiene

Product Specifications

  • Material: Premium food-grade silicone & durable ABS handle
  • Included Set: Bottle brush, nipple brush, straw brush, storage box
  • Style: Soft bristle, ergonomic design with ventilated storage
  • Colors: Classic White, Fresh Mint, Baby Pink
  • Suitable for: All types of baby bottles, nipples, and feeding accessories

Why Choose This Brush Set

  • Gentle yet effective cleaning for baby bottles and accessories
  • Silicone bristles outlast traditional sponges or nylon brushes
  • Hygienic storage box prevents mess and keeps brushes fresh
  • Easy to clean and maintain for everyday use
  • Compact and space-saving, perfect for modern homes

products.title: Ultimate 3-Piece Baby Feeding Bowl Set - Portable, Microwave-Safe Dishes with Sealed Storage for Easy Mealtime!
products.body_html:
Introducing the ultimate solution for your baby's feeding needs: the 3-Piece Baby Feeding Bowl Set! These portable, microwave-safe learning dishes are designed specifically for little ones, making mealtime a fun and stress-free experience for both parents and children.



Crafted from high-quality, PVC-free PP material, this set is not only safe for your child but also durable enough to withstand the rigors of everyday use. The bowls feature a charming patchwork pattern that will delight your little one, making them excited to eat their meals.




Each bowl has a generous capacity of 60ML, perfect for serving up your baby's favorite complementary foods. The square shape ensures stability, preventing spills and messes during mealtime. Plus, these bowls are microwave-safe, allowing you to easily heat up meals without worrying about harmful chemicals leaching into the food.

One of the standout features of this feeding set is the sealed storage boxes that come with it. These boxes are perfect for storing leftovers or pre-prepared meals, keeping them fresh and ready for your little one's next feeding. Say goodbye to food waste and hello to convenient meal prep!




 

This feeding bowl set is suitable for babies aged 7-12 months, making it an essential addition to your baby's dining essentials. Whether you're at home or on the go, these lightweight and portable bowls are easy to carry, ensuring that your baby can enjoy their meals anywhere.

Upgrade your baby's dining experience with the 3-Piece Baby Feeding Bowl Set – the perfect blend of functionality, safety, and style. Make mealtime enjoyable and hassle-free for you and your little one!
